color.color_production: PRODUCTION: This color is produced by blending 41.21 percent red, 32.97 percent green, and 25.82 percent blue.
color.color_description: DESCRIPTION:A shade of bistre that has an even deeper orange cast produced by burning Sawtooth oak and boiling its soot. Technically it is theoretical color, and darkened with a French Grey-Black with a purple cast
